title: Sampan
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mix of Chinese, Vietnamese, Japanese, and Korean cuisine. Some dishes include tofu or faux meat. Menu is in German and English. In 2015 added a vegan menu with around 50 dishes.
